name: Captain Tarpals' Electropole
Lore: 'Tarpals'' electropole is nearly as old as he is. Used to enforce the laws of Otoh Gunga.',
Text: 'Deploys on Captain Tarpals. May ''throw'' (place in Used Pile) to target a character, creature or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. If destiny +3 > defense value, target is landspeed = 0 and power - 3 for remainder of turn.',
